thread.title_full: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of KLA-Tencor Corporation

author: stockhouse.com
title: Harwood Feffer LLP Investigation of KLA-Tencor Corporation
text:
NEW YORK , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Harwood Feffer LLP ( www.hfesq.com ) is investigating potential claims against the board of directors of KLA-Tencor Corporation ("KLA-Tencor" or the "Company") (NASDAQ: KLAC) concerning the proposed acquisition of the Company by affiliates of Lam Research Corporation ("Lam").
Under the terms of the offer, the Lam would acquire KLA-Tencor in a transaction valued at approximately $10.6 billion . Pursuant to the deal, KLA-Tencor stockholders would be entitled to elect to receive the economic equivalent of $32.00 in cash and 0.5 of a share of Lam Research common stock, in all-cash, all-stock, or mixed consideration, representing total consideration of approximately $67.02 per share. According to Yahoo Finance, at least one analyst has set a target price for KLA-Tencor stock of $81.00 per share.
Our investigation concerns whether the KLA-Tencor board of directors is fulfilling its fiduciary duties, maximizing the value of the Company, disclosing all material benefits and costs, and obtaining full and fair consideration for Company stockholders.
